Subject: It's Showtime
Date: Thu, 24 May 2001 10:41:25 -0700

MIME-Version: 1.0

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>


Prebons logic functions were active even if he himself were in Stasis lock.
He saw an outpost set afire by Predacon forces. He sensed that somehow it
wasn't real. Standing before him were five recruits fresh off the assembly
line. He somehow knew that the group was learning the fine art of Predacon
warfare. A female stepped forward fireing a series of bolts from her rifle.
The opposition collapsed, parylized with the effects of a disruptor blast.

Next a creature of raw power transformed and bullrushed the door. The
entrance exploded from the force of the impact destroying two more bots
inside.

A strong Sturdy bot helped the fourth bot set up some sort of shield
generator to keep reinforcements from interfering with the excercise.

Above thier heads the fifth member of the unit used a sniper rifle to handle
any opposition left. The excersize took less than 10 minutes earth time but
it wasn't fast enough for his taste. If he wanted the excersize done right
he'd demand strict obedience. Somehow he knew that no matter what happened
to them they were his.
